\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,column sep=small]
    {\deg = 0} \& {\deg = 1} \& {\deg = 2} \& {\deg = 3} \& {\cdots } \\
    \begin{array}{c} I^0(B^k)\\\oplus\\ I^0(H^k) \end{array} \& \begin{array}{c} I^1(B^k)\\\oplus \\I^1(H^k) \end{array} \& \begin{array}{c} I^2(B^k)\\\oplus \\I^2(H^k) \end{array} \& \begin{array}{c} I^3(B^k)\\\oplus \\I^3(H^k) \end{array} \& \cdots \\
    \& {I^0(H^{k+1})} \& {I^1(H^{k+1})} \& {I^2(H^{k+1})} \& \cdots \\
    \&\& {I^0(H^{k+2})} \& {I^1(H^{k+2})} \& \cdots
    \arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
    \arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
    \arrow["\bigoplus"{description}, draw=none, from=2-2, to=3-2]
    \arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
    \arrow["\bigoplus"{description}, draw=none, from=2-3, to=3-3]
    \arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
    \arrow["\bigoplus"{description}, draw=none, from=2-4, to=3-4]
    \arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
    \arrow[from=3-3, to=3-4]
    \arrow["\bigoplus"{description}, draw=none, from=3-3, to=4-3]
    \arrow[from=3-4, to=3-5]
    \arrow["\bigoplus"{description}, draw=none, from=3-4, to=4-4]
    \arrow[from=4-3, to=4-4]
    \arrow[from=4-4, to=4-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
